title: Advanced Statistical Concept Connecting Exercises: Transferable Knowledge Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts (mean, variance, standard deviation, hypothesis testing)
context.additional_context: Advanced statistical analysis training for practitioners to solve real-world data problems encountered in daily workflows.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the conceptual associations among four or more statistical techniques (e.g., regression analysis, chi-square test).
Learners can propose solutions by applying three or more statistical techniques to real-world work data (provided in virtual scenarios).
Learners can write reports interpreting statistical analysis results in the context of work tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
